definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Dry eyes can result from an improper balance of tear production and drainage.
sentences.chinese: 乾眼症是由於淚液的分泌與排出失衡所引起的。

sentences.english: Scientists want to investigate the relation between xerophthalmia occurrence and smut contiguity.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們打算探討乾眼症與煤塵接觸之間的關係。

sentences.english: People interested in the above article What Are Dry Eyes?
sentences.chinese: “感興趣的人以上文章”什麼是乾眼症？

sentences.english: It is feasible to treat severe xerophthalmia by the free grafting of sublingual gland.
sentences.chinese: 舌下腺遊離移植治療重症乾眼症是可行的。

sentences.english: If so, you may be suffering from dry eye syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 如果是，你可能患上了乾眼症。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the etiology, diagnosis and treatment of dry eye after eye surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討眼手術後乾眼症的病因，診斷和治療。

sentences.english: The dry eye or, more precisely, tear film dysfunction commonly aggravates both patients and ophthalmolologists.
sentences.chinese: 乾眼症或淚膜機能不良最常使醫患雙方感到困惱。

definition: an excess of heat caused by a deficiency in Yin energy (idiom)
macula lutea (anatomy, central area of retina)/yellow spot
